Permission required to take camera using camera
Permission required to access phone storage
Use Dooit to help you save money!
Monitor performance towards your savings goal!
Get rewards for your persistence in saving!
Search for: Topics, titles, tags, etc…

By clicking register, you are agreeing\n to our *Terms & Condition*
Name can only contain letters and numbers
Name can\'t be longer than 150 characters
Please provide us with either your phone number or email address, or both
Email can\'t be longer than 150 characters
Mobile Number must be longer than 9 digits
Mobile Number must be shorter than 15 digits
Password must be longer than 6 characters
A user with the username already exists
Unable to log in with provided credentials.
You were logged out due to an authentication error
My Name is Bina. I\'m gonna help you save!
Select the goal you want to save for, please.
What do you want to save for?
Add an image for your savings goal to help keep you motivated
Add an image for your savings goal to help keep you motivated
Do you know how much you need to save?
Great! Just type the amount that you want to save.
That is a big goal. Let us get saving then. Do you have a date that you want to save this by?
When would you like to have saved this much?
No problem, I can help. How much money can you afford to save each week?
Have you started saving money towards this goal?
How much have you already saved?
If you save %4$s %1$s each week you will save enough to get your %2$s in %3$s weeks.
Sorry, I do not understand that and have not been taught how to handle it yet.
Sorry, I do not understand that and have not been taught how to handle it yet.
Sorry, I do not understand that and have not t been taught how to handle it yet.
Sorry, I do not understand that and have not been taught how to handle it yet.
See you later! Don\'t forget to come back every week to track your savings.
Great job! You\'ve set your first savings goal!
Let\'s have a look at your progress…
Take me to the tips, please.
Take me to this week\'s challenge.
Hi, $(user.preferred_name)! My name is Bina. I\'m your personal money coach and I\'m here to help you save.
Hi $(user.preferred_name). Welcome to Dooit. I can\'t wait to help you save. Should we get started?
So what are you saving for?
I want to upload my own picture.
I want to select a picture from the gallery.
How much will you need to save for $(goal.name)?
By what date do you want to have saved for your goal?
"Sure. Let's work out how much you can save by setting up a budget."
A budget is an estimate of your income, savings, expenses and balance for a set period of time.
Setting a budget is an important step towards learning to manage your money better.
"That's okay. You can create the budget after you've created your savings goal."
"I suggest you start by saving Rpxxxx per week. What do you think?"
If you save $(goal.weekly_target_currency) each week you will save enough to get your $(goal.name) in $(goal.weeks_down) weeks, $(goal.remainder_days) days.
Yes! I already have this much money saved:
Fantastic! Did you know that $(goal_proto.num_users) users are also saving for this goal?
Typically, $(goal.name) costs Rp. $(goal_proto.default_price). Is that the price of yours?
Yes, that\'s the price. What\'s next?
No problem! Go ahead and select your own amount for your savings goal.
Don\'t worry, you can always change it later.
$(user.preferred_name), you have to save $(goal.weekly_target_currency) each week to reach your $(goal.name) by $(goal.end_date).
That\'s $(goal.weeks_left_down) weeks and $(goal.remainder_days_left) days from now.
Look at you go! Well done for adding to your savings!
Awesome! Take me to this week\'s challenge.
Show me tips to grow my savings.
Great job. Remember to come back often to track your savings, and keep up the good work!
You\'ve been working so hard to reach your goal! You should only withdraw money if you need it for an emergency.
I understand. Never mind, I want to keep saving.
I understand, but I still want to withdraw the money.
You\'ve made a good choice not to withdraw your savings. I\'m proud of you $(user.preferred_name)!
Stay on track with your savings by checking out these easy tips.
How much do you want to withdraw?
Get back on track with your savings by checking out these easy tips.
Remember to come back every week to track your savings. Keep up the good work, $(user.preferred_name)!
Can I take this week\'s challenge instead?
What do you want to edit?
How much money do you think can you save each week?
If you save $(goal.weekly_target_currency) per week, you\’ll have enough money to get your $(goal.name) in only $(goal.weeks_down) weeks, $(goal.remainder_days) days.
Come back to track your savings weekly and watch as your goal becomes a reality!
Oh? Why do you want to delete this goal?
Congratulations! That is great news. I\'ll update this now.
I can help you work out another savings plan that will be easier to afford.
Sure, no problem. You can get back on track with your savings at any time. Take a look at our tips or take this week\'s challenge.
Come back to track your savings weekly and watch as your goal becomes a reality!
Thanks! I want to check out savings tips.
No thanks, I\'m done for now. Let\'s exit.
Select a picture from the gallery.
No reason, I just want to delete it.
Never mind! I want to keep saving.
Okay, I\'m done for now. Can we exit?
Okay! Please help me create a new savings plan.
No thanks. Just delete my goal.
I want to change the Target value
I\'d like to see some savings tips!
I\'d like to check on my own savings plan.

If you are 17 years of age or younger: Does a parent or guardian agree to you completing this survey?
Does a parent consent to you completing this survey?
That\'s alright, maybe next time. Would you like to check out some savings tips?
Care giver of family members or children
What is the name of your SMK?
What city do you live in?
Have you ever had a paid job for longer than one month? (Include working in family business and/or apprenticeships if paid.)
Within what range did your monthly earning fall for your last job?
What was your employment status in your last job?
Permanent staff (signed contract with specific salary and benefits)
Indefinite term employment (probation, pathway to permanent staff)
Temporary/casual (working on short assignments or task, no contract)
Apprenticeship (learning new skill and receiving small monetary support to cover transport cost)
Daily worker (working on a day to day basis)
Have you ever owned or shared ownership of a business?
Within what range did your monthly business earnings fall?
Do you ever save some of your money?
How frequently do you save money?
Varies (different times, not a set frequency)
Where do you keep most of your savings?
In the last 3 months, approximately how much money did you save in total?
Have you ever saved money to pay for education costs, like fees for a training course?
Have you ever saved money to pay for the cost of looking for a job or attending job interviews?
Have you ever saved money to have some extra in case of emergencies?
Have you ever saved money to invest in business opportunities?
Have you ever saved money to support family needs?
Have you ever saved money to buy personal items for everyday use like clothes or food?
Have you ever saved money to buy personal items for everyday use like clothes or food?
Have you ever saved money to buy items that last longer, like a phone, computer, or motorbike?
Have you ever saved money to go out friends for fun?
How often do you use a mobile phone?
What is your mobile phone most useful for?
Using apps or tools to help me manage my life, like trackers or calendars.
What is your mobile phone least useful for?
Using apps or tools to help me manage my life, like trackers or calendars.
Who owns the mobile phone that you use?
Here are some people you might interact with. Please tell me if you think they approve, disapprove, or are neutral toward you or your friends using mobile phones?
How much credit do you or your family put into your mobile phone on a typical week?
Do you have any of the following assets in your home?
Thinking about your life right now, or in the past 3 months, circle the option that best reflects how often you feel this statement is true for you:
Never – You never feel this statement is true for you or applies to you.
Seldom – You seldom, or almost never, feel this statement is true for you or applies to you.
Sometimes – You sometimes feel this statement is true for you or applies to you.
Often – You often feel this statement is true for you or applies to you.
Always – You always feel this statement is true for you or applies to you.
I feel appreciated by other people.
I do things that will make me achieve great career for my future.
I learn new things to adapt.
I finish my duties on time.
Despite being lazy, I still go to school or work.
I feel proud when I my work quality is good.
I follow the dress code in my workplace or school.
I get along with many kind of people.
I work with anyone (with different backgrounds or social environment).
I appreciate any input or help from other people.
I’m responsible for what I do.
I can express what I feel and what I think clearly.
Other people can understand my ideas and opinions.
I read to get new information (from books, internet, etc) and use that information.
I learn new things by listening.
I gather, learn and organize information to solve a problem.
I seek information from various sources to solve problems in the workplace/school.
I decide something based on experience.
I’m good at adapting to changes (example: workplace, school, community).
I have the skills needed for the job interview.
I have the ability to make an interesting CV/Resume.
I have the ability to create an interesting cover letter for the company.
I have the ability and experience required by the company.
"Let's get started! How much money do you get each week?"
How often do you get income?
I want to change my picture.
This seems great! I accept the challenge.
I want to change the date.
I want to change the amount that I save each week.
By taking this challenge, you are agreeing to our *Terms & Conditions*.
No challenge available.\nPlease try again soon!
Quiz question has option without text.
Sorry, I don\'t have a hint for you
Could not make a connection to the server
The persisted challenge is no longer valid and will be replaced by one from the server
Can you land on the sun at night?
Save %s each week to get your %s in %s weeks, %s days.
You must set a profile image, or tap skip
Your username has been changed to \'%s\'
Your email address has been changed to \'%s\'
Hi, $(user.preferred_name)! How are you? I noticed that it\'s been $(achievements.weeks_since_saved) weeks since your last savings. Do you have anything to update? Come on, let\'s go!
Hi, $(user.preferred_name)! I just posted a new challenge. Want to check it out?
"Hey, $(user.preferred_name)! Don't forget about the challenge! Want to take it now?"
"Hello again, $(user.preferred_name)! I noticed that you started the challenge but haven't finished yet. The deadline is approaching quickly… Complete the challenge and submit it today!"
Woohoo! Guess what, $(user.preferred_name)?! You\'re the winner of our challenge! Congrats!

"Uh-oh! $(user.preferred_name), I noticed that it's already $(date.today) and you haven't reached your savings goals for $(goal.name) yet. Don't worry — I can help you adjust your timelines and savings goals. Let's do this!"
Hi, $(user.preferred_name)! I\'d love to get to know you better. Care to answer a few questions?
Hi, $(user.preferred_name). Do you have a few minutes to answer some questions for me? Your answers will help me to make Dooit even better!
Hi, $(user.preferred_name). Don\'t forget about the survey! Would you like to take it now?
